exact color not known color b - white - exact color not known color c - pale green exact color not known hook size h - 8 - 5 00 mm skill level intermediate size 12 x 12 stitch marker 0 yarn needle 1 special stitches none 1 my ravelry store http //www ravelry com/stores/smoothfox-crochet-designs my etsy store http //smoothfox etsy com my crochet & knit related gifts http //zazzle com/smoothfox* my blog http //smoothfoxlover blogspot com/ if you want a pdf copy of this pattern or if you make this item please click on this link below and add your own pictures as a project on ravelry just click on the crochet hook with the words hook it if this is a crochet pattern or if it is a knit pattern click on the words cast on near the top right side and this will add your item as a project then you can add the pictures when you have completed your project http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/free-smoothfoxs-starburst-flower-square want to win $25 00 up to $100 00 cid 1 participate in the cid 1 smoothfox - online angels winter 2011 charity square drive information is below the pattern instructions round 1 using color a chain 4 11 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook join with slip st to top of beg chain-4 12 double_crochet round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same st *2 double_crochet in next st repeat from * around join with slip st to beg double_crochet 24 double_crochet round 3 chain 3 2 double_crochet in next st chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in remaining 2 chain s 4 double_crochet point made * double_crochet in next st 2 double_crochet in next st chain 6 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook double_crochet in remaining 2 chain s * repeat around * to * around join with slip st to top of beg chain-3 finish off 84 double_crochet 2 round 4 using color b slip st in 2nd chain of point chain 1 single_crochet in same st chain 1 treble_crochet in 2nd double_crochet from round 3 below between the points chain 1 treble_crochet in same st chain 1 * single_crochet in 2nd chain of point chain 1 treble_crochet in 2nd double_crochet from round 3 below between the points chain 1 treble_crochet in same st chain 1 * repeat from * to * around join with slip st in beg single_crochet finish off 24 treble_crochet 12 single_crochet 36 chain-1 round 5 using color c join with a slip st in any single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in same st skip chain-1 space skip treble_crochet 5 treble_crochet in chain-1 space skip treble_crochet skip chain-1 space * single_crochet in next single_crochet skip chain-1 space skip next treble_crochet 5 treble_crochet in chain-1 space skip next treble_crochet skip chain-1 space
